text: Chavarat Charnvirakul (born 7 June 1936) is a Thai politician. He was an acting prime minister of Thailand for a few days during the 2008 Thai political crisis.How Thailand’s Deputy PM Could Score the Top Job—and Redefine the Country’s Politics ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Prime ministers of Thailand Category:Living people
title: Chavarat Charnvirakul
